item.description:
The movie times have been posted and we'll be going to the 2:20 movie. I hope to see you there!

Since there was a bunch of people interested at the social meetup tonight, we're going to go see the new Predator movie (http://www.imdb.com/t...) this Sunday July 11th. As always, they never post the actual show times until a couple days before, but we're planning on seeing a matinee around 2-ish to avoid the opening day crowd. I'll post the actual start time here once it's up.

I'll be outside the theater (or right inside the lobby if it's as crazy hot as is in today) a half hour before the movie starts and will go inside to get tickets 15 minutes before show time.
item.name: Predators- matinee
